headline: ?15,500 crore bet! IRFC, Asian Paints to Patanjali among LIC's top 15 stock picks in Q4. Do you own?
intro: LIC stock portfolio: Among the 15 top stock picks of LIC, wherein the PSU company ploughed nearly  ?15,463 crore, two-thirds (10 companies) have managed to deliver returns to investors so far in the financial year 2025-26 (FY26).
imagecaption: ?15,500 crore bet: IRFC, Asian Paints to Patanjali among LIC's top 15 stock picks in Q4. Do you own?

headline: Analysts and investors have soured on Asian Paints. Can it prove them wrong?
intro: Of the 38 brokers covering the stock, barely a handful are still positive on it. Is this pessimism warranted, or will India?s leading paintmaker take everyone by surprise?
imagecaption: Asian Paints' management has called out the current demand environment as the worst in two decades. Photo: Pixabay

headline: Intense competition hurts paint companies' profitability; more pain in the offing
intro: Demand for decorative paints is likely to remain muted in H1FY26, owing to an earlier-than-expected monsoon. If demand fails to improve in the second half of FY26, another round of de-rating could ensue.
imagecaption: Asian Paints Ltd led the decline in the sector's profitability. Image: Pixabay

headline: This CEO has no fixed-income investments, and has never done an SIP
intro: Ashish Shanker, managing director and CEO of Motilal Oswal Private Wealth, has a simple investing stragegy. He keeps 6-8 months of household expenses in his savings account and puts everything beyond that into equities.
imagecaption: Ashish Shanker, MD and CEO, Motilal Oswal Private Wealth Management, is all-in on equities.

headline: THIS paint stock turns  ?500 crore of Mukesh Ambani-owned Reliance Industries into  ?10,000 crore in 17 years
intro: RIL had acquired stake in Asian Paints back in 2008 for around  ?500 crore, which is worth  ?10,730 crore as of Asian Paints' last closing price. At this level, RIL can clock in 2046% gain on its investment.
imagecaption: THIS paint stock turns  ?500 crore of Mukesh Ambani-owned Reliance Industries into  ?10,000 crore in 17 years

headline: Asian Paints share price falls 2% amid reports of Reliance looking to sell entire 4.9% stake
intro: According to a report in The Economic Times, Reliance Industries has revived its plan to sell its 4.9% stake in Asian Paints. For this purpose, it has roped in Bank of America (BofA) to manage the transaction.
imagecaption: Asian Paints share price falls 2% amid reports of Reliance looking to sell entire 4.9% stake

headline: Asian Paints sees a greener FY26; analysts see red
intro: In FY25, Asian Paints recorded a stark decline in profits due to weak demand and intensified competition. With analysts downgrading earnings estimates for the upcoming years, the paint maker faces a challenging environment.
imagecaption: The Asian Paints stock is down by about 15% over the past year. (Pixabay)

headline: L&T, Britannia to Zee Entertainment: 6 stocks declare dividends up to  ?75: Do you own?
intro: Dividend Stocks: L&T, Britannia Industries, Asian Paints, REC Ltd, Zee Entertainment and Aarti Industries have declared dividends of up to  ?75 along with their Q4 results.
imagecaption: Dividend Stocks: 5 Stocks declare dividend up to  ?75

headline: Asian Paints Q4 Results: Cons PAT falls 45% YoY to  ?692.13 crore
intro: Asian Paints Q4 Results: Asian Paints reported a 45% decline in net profit for Q4 FY25 at  ?692.13 cr, with revenues falling 4.3% YoY. Demand remains weak, particularly in decorative coatings, while the industrial segment showed growth. The company proposed a final dividend of  ?20.55 apiece.
imagecaption: Asian Paints Q4 Results: Cons PAT falls 45% YoY to  ?692.13 crore

headline: Q4 results today: Britannia, Bharat Forge, Asian Paints and L&T among 74 companies to declare earnings on May 8
intro: Q4 results today: On May 8, additional firms, including Britannia Industries and Canara Bank, are set to announce their financial outcomes, per the BSE calendar.
imagecaption: Q4 results today: Britannia Industries will declare earnings today.
